name: The Chopping Chambers
description:
Use your trusty axe to slice your way through 3 unique areas! Will you survive The Chambers?

Made over the course of 5 days for the TigerDev Spring Break Jam 2020.

CONTROLS

  • W, A, S, D - move
  • Left click - swing axe
  • Hold left click - charge attack
  • Right click - throw axe
  • Hold right click - grapple

CREDITS

  • Seth Burchfield - Programming and Sound
  • Cooper Garvin - Art and Assets
